input_variables.name: start_time
input_variables.description: Start date and time of the orbit propagation. Format; yyyy-MM-ddThh:mi:ss.sss in UTC

input_variables.name: stop_time
input_variables.description: Stop date and time of the orbit propagation. Format; yyyy-MM-ddThh:mi:ss.sss in UTC

input_variables.name: position_x
input_variables.description: Initial position in meters. X axis

input_variables.name: position_y
input_variables.description: Initial position in meters. Y axis

input_variables.name: position_z
input_variables.description: Initial position in meters. Z axis

input_variables.name: velocity_x
input_variables.description: Initial velocity in meters / second. X axis

input_variables.name: velocity_y
input_variables.description: Initial velocity in meters / second. Y axis

input_variables.name: velocity_z
input_variables.description: Initial velocity in meters / second. Z axis

definition.name: time
definition.description: Date and time of the ephemeris point. Format; yyyy-MM-ddThh:mi:ss.sss in UTC

definition.name: position_x
definition.description: Initial position in meters. X axis

definition.name: position_y
definition.description: Initial position in meters. Y axis

definition.name: position_z
definition.description: Initial position in meters. Z axis

definition.name: velocity_x
definition.description: Initial velocity in meters / second. X axis

definition.name: velocity_y
definition.description: Initial velocity in meters / second. Y axis

definition.name: velocity_z
definition.description: Initial velocity in meters / second. Z axis
